articles.content:
Grand festival for national reunification in Seoul
    Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- A grand festival for national reunification was held in Seoul on August 15 with the attendance of over 10,000 people including students under the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils, according to a news report.
 The participants held a ceremony marking the 56th anniversary of the national liberation, a competition in singing songs on reunification, etc. to vow to implement the June 15 joint declaration.    
 Prior to it, more than 500 people participated in the short distance marathon race.

WFP executive director and her party arrive
articles.content:
WFP executive director and her party arrive
    Pyongyang, August 18 (KCNA) -- Catherine Bertini, executive director of the World Food Program, and her party arrived here today.
 They were greeted at the airport by vice-foreign minister Choe Su Hon and David Morton, resident coordinator of the United Nations and  representative of the WFP, and Richard W. Corsino, deputy representative of the WFP.
